utils

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds static methods that might be useful in numerous places
    Author:
    Matthew

      This casts and parses the column of a piece panel that is the source of a mouse event

      Takes the memory preservative char representation of a piece and returns the string name
      static int getRowFromMouseEvent(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      This casts and parses the row of a piece panel that is the source of a mouse event
      static java.lang.String getTime()
      Returns the current date and time in human readable format (MMM dd, yyyy HH:mm:ss)
      static java.lang.String getTimeNoSpaces()
      Returns the same thing as getTime, but with dashes and underscores instead of spaces so it can be used in a file path.

      Writes a string to a file designated by filename
